New Records: England conceded their biggest ever ODI total and suffered their biggest defeat in ODI history
Key Match Events: Heinrich Klaasen scored 109 off 61 balls and reached his century
Marco Jansen contributed with 74 runs and took crucial wickets
Key wickets fell at crucial moments
Pre-Game Insights: England chose to bowl first despite the challenging conditions
South Africa were confident and prepared for the match
The pitch conditions were hot and humid, affecting performance
Post-Match Reflections: England's World Cup hopes were significantly dented
South Africa's performance was praised as exceptional
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played in extreme heat and humidity
The result was a significant blow for England's campaign
South Africa's all-round performance was highlighted
Others: The match was part of the Cricket World Cup 2023
